header.title: Terms & Conditions (AGB)
header.subtitle: General Terms and Conditions
header.description: These General Terms and Conditions (AGB) apply to all orders placed through the seller's online shop.

clause1.title: 1. Scope
clause1.body: These General Terms and Conditions (AGB) apply to all orders placed through the seller's online shop. Deviating terms of the customer will not be recognized unless the seller expressly agrees to them in writing (e.g., by email).

clause2.title: 2. Contracting Party

clause3.title: 3. Offer and Product Presentation
clause3.body: All product images in the online shop are for illustration purposes only and are non-binding. Minor deviations in color, shape or design may occur.

clause3_1.title: 3.1 Right to Exchange Equivalent Components
clause3_1.body:
The seller reserves the right to replace individual components of a set (e.g., balloons or decorative elements) with equivalent or higher-quality alternatives, provided that:

the total value is maintained,
the function is not impaired,
no price change occurs.

Optical deviations that do not significantly affect the overall impression are permissible.

clause4.title: 4. Order Process and Contract Conclusion
clause4.body:
By submitting the order, the customer makes a binding offer to purchase.
The purchase contract is concluded as soon as the seller confirms the order in writing by email.

clause5.title: 5. Prices and Shipping Costs
clause5.body:
All prices are final prices without value-added tax, as the seller does not charge value-added tax in accordance with § 6 para. 1 no. 27 UStG (small business regulation).
Shipping costs are shown separately in the ordering process.

clause6.title: 6. Delivery
clause6.body:
Delivery takes place by agreement within the specified delivery area. Delivery times may vary depending on the order situation.
We are not liable for delays that are outside our control, e.g., caused by shipping service providers.

clause7.title: 7. Payment
clause7.body:
The seller offers various payment methods, such as:
Credit card
Payment on pickup

clause8.title: 8. Right of Withdrawal / Right of Cancellation (14 Days)
clause8.body:
Customers have a right of withdrawal of 14 days in accordance with the Austrian Distance and Off-Premises Transactions Act (FAGG).
The exact conditions, exceptions to the right of withdrawal, and information on how to exercise the withdrawal are described on the website under “Right of Withdrawal / Cancellation”.

clause9.title: 9. Warranty and Liability
clause9.body:
The statutory warranty provisions (VGG) apply.

No liability is assumed for damage caused by:

improper handling,
heat, cold, fire or sharp objects,
incorrect storage by customers,
natural fluctuations in helium float time.

clause10.title: 10. Retention of Title
clause10.body: The goods remain the property of the seller until full payment has been made.

clause11.title: 11. Data Protection
clause11.body: The processing of personal data is carried out in accordance with GDPR and the privacy policy on the seller's website.

clause12.title: 12. Online Dispute Resolution (ODR Platform)

clause13.title: 13. Jurisdiction and Applicable Law
clause13.body: Austrian law applies. The place of jurisdiction is the registered office of the company, unless mandatory consumer protection provisions provide otherwise.

footer.description: Further information can be found in our

header.title: Privacy Policy (Austria / GDPR)
header.subtitle: Privacy
header.description: The controller responsible for processing personal data on this website is:

section1.title: 1. Responsible Party
section1.intro: The controller responsible for processing personal data on this website is:

section2.title: 2. Collection and Processing of Personal Data
section2.intro: We process personal data that you voluntarily provide to us, in particular:
section2.purposeIntro: This data is used for the following purposes:

section3.title: 3. Legal Basis for Processing
section3.body:
Processing of personal data is based on:
Art. 6(1)(b) GDPR (performance of a contract)
Art. 6(1)(c) GDPR (legal obligation)

section4.title: 4. Retention Period
section4.body: Personal data is stored only for as long as required for the respective processing purposes or as long as statutory retention obligations apply (e.g., tax and commercial retention obligations).

section5.title: 5. Disclosure to Third Parties
section5.intro: Personal data is only disclosed to third parties insofar as this is necessary for contract performance, in particular to:
thirdPartiesList: Payment service providers (e.g., credit or debit card providers)
section5.conclusion: No further disclosure takes place without your explicit consent or unless there is a legal obligation.

section6.title: 6. Cookies
section6.body:
This website uses only technically necessary cookies that are required for operation and basic functionality.
No processing of personal data for analytics or marketing purposes takes place.

section7.title: 7. Rights of Data Subjects
section7.intro: Under the GDPR, you have the right to:
rightsList: Obtain access to your stored personal data
Request rectification of inaccurate or incomplete data
Request deletion of your personal data, unless a statutory retention obligation applies
Lodge a complaint with the competent data protection authority
section7.outro:
Competent supervisory authority in Austria:
Austrian Data Protection Authority – www.dsb.gv.at

section8.title: 8. Contact
section8.intro: For questions regarding data protection, please contact:

header.title: Imprint (Austria)
header.subtitle: Imprint
header.description: Legal information and company details according to Austrian law.

section9.title: 9. Member of the Economic Chamber
section9.value:
Austrian Economic Chamber (WKO)
(specific professional group to be provided)

section10.title: 10. Company Register
section10.value: Not registered in the company register

section12.title: 12. Disclaimer:
section12.paragraph1: Despite careful control, we assume no liability for the content of external links.
section12.paragraph2: The operators of the linked pages are solely responsible for the content of the linked pages.

section13.title: 13. Copyright:
section13.paragraph1: All content, images and texts on this website are subject to copyright.
section13.paragraph2: Use without written permission is not permitted.

header.title: Withdrawal Policy
header.subtitle: Right of Withdrawal
header.description: Information about the 14-day right of withdrawal and its exceptions.

section1.title: 1. Right of Withdrawal
section1.body: Consumers have the right to withdraw from this purchase contract within 14 days without giving any reason.

section2.title: 2. Withdrawal Period
section2.body: The withdrawal period is 14 days from the day on which the customer, or a third party designated by the customer who is not the carrier, has received the goods.

section3.title: 3. Exclusion of the Right of Withdrawal
section3.intro: The right of withdrawal does not apply to the following goods:
exclusions: Individually made products manufactured to customer specifications, including balloon compositions, custom sets, and goods with individually selected colors, shapes, lettering, and decorative elements.
Helium-filled balloons, as they have a limited float time and their properties deteriorate over time.
Balloon compositions and decorations made for a specific date or event.
Goods with limited shelf life, including chocolate, sweets, fresh flowers, and other food items that are part of gift sets.
Gift sets and gift boxes if the packaging has been opened after handover, a seal has been removed, or the contents have been altered.
Goods that have been used in whole or in part after receipt, in particular inflated balloons and decorative elements.
section3.damage: In case of damage upon delivery, please contact us within 24 hours of receipt.

section4.title: 4. Effects of Withdrawal
section4.body:
If the withdrawal is effective, we will reimburse all payments received from the customer, including delivery costs (except for additional costs resulting from the customer's choice of a type of delivery other than the cheapest standard delivery we offer), without undue delay and no later than 14 days from the day we receive notice of withdrawal from this contract.
We will use the same means of payment that the customer used for the original transaction, unless expressly agreed otherwise.

section5.title: 5. Notice of Withdrawal

section6.title: 6. Return of Goods
section6.body:
The customer must return or hand over the goods without undue delay and in any event no later than 14 days from the day on which they inform us about the withdrawal from this contract.
The customer bears the direct costs of returning the goods, unless otherwise agreed.
